item.name: [2001] Show available time periods before time period creation

exec: pm.test("A list of time periods has been successfully fetched.", function () {
pm.test("For now, only the four default time periods are listed: 24x7, none, nonworkhours and workhours.", function() {

pm.test("The time period has been successfully created, with name '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodName") + "' and alias '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodAlias") + "'.", function () {

item.name: [2001] Show available time periods after time period creation

exec: pm.test("A list of time periods has been successfully fetched.", function () {

pm.test("Five time periods are now listed: the default ones and a new one named '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodName") + "' with alias '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodAlias") + "'.", function() {
pm.test("For this new time period, no other field has been filled.", function() {

pm.test("The time period with name '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodName") + "' and alias '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("timePeriodAlias") + "' has been successfully deleted.", function () {

item.name: [2001] Show available time periods after time period deletion

exec: pm.test("A list of time periods has been successfully fetched.", function () {
pm.test("The listed time periods are now back to four: 24x7, none, nonworkhours and workhours.", function() {
pm.test("Displayed message is the one that is expected (Successful logout).", function() {
